## Belief Distribution Elicitation Tool

Here you can find our method to elicit parameteric (beta) belief distributions, as described in Gonzalez-Fernandez, Bosch-Rosa and Meissner (2024):"Direct Elicitation of Parametric Belief Distributions: An application to inflation expectations" 

- [Read the paper](https://opus4.kobv.de/opus4-hsog/frontdoor/deliver/index/docId/5604/file/BSoE_DP_0048.pdf) detailing the methodology and findings.
- [oTree implementation](https://github.com/TGKMeissner/BetaBeliefs.git) access github repository with the oTree implementation.
- [Qualtrics implementation](beta.qsf){download="beta.qsf"} download .QSF file.
